title: filters
content: # `prefect.server.events.filters` ## Classes ### `AutomationFilterCreated` Filter by `Automation.created`. **Methods:** #### `as_sql_filter` ```python theme={null} as_sql_filter(self, db: 'PrefectDBInterface') -> sa.ColumnElement[bool] ``` Generate SQL filter from provided filter parameters. If no filters parameters are available, return a TRUE filter. ### `AutomationFilterName` Filter by `Automation.created`. **Methods:** #### `as_sql_filter` ```python theme={null} as_sql_filter(self, db: 'PrefectDBInterface') -> sa.ColumnElement[bool] ``` Generate SQL filter from provided filter parameters.
